sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Table, Container, Row, Col, Badge } from 'reactstrap'; const Metrics = () => { // Sample inventory data const inventoryData = [ { id: 1, productName: 'Product A', quantity: 50, price: 20.0 }, { id: 2, productName: 'Product B', quantity: 30, price: 15.0 }, { id: 3, productName: 'Product C', quantity: 100, price: 10.0 }, ]; // Sample ads performance data const adsData = [ { id: 1, adName: 'Ad Campaign 1', impressions: 1000, clicks: 150, conversionRate: '15%' }, { id: 2, adName: 'Ad Campaign 2', impressions: 800, clicks: 120, conversionRate: '15%' }, { id: 3, adName: 'Ad Campaign 3', impressions: 500, clicks: 50, conversionRate: '10%' }, ]; // Sample niche categories const nicheCategories = [ { id: 1, name: 'E-commerce', color: 'primary' }, { id: 2, name: 'Technology', color: 'success' }, { id: 3, name: 'Health & Wellness', color: 'info' }, { id: 4, name: 'Education', color: 'warning' }, { id: 5, name: 'Finance', color: 'danger' }, ]; return (

Categories

{nicheCategories.map(category => ( {category.name} ))}

Inventory

{inventoryData.map(item => ( ))}
ID Product Name Quantity Price ($)
{item.id} {item.productName} {item.quantity} {item.price.toFixed(2)}

Ad Performance

{adsData.map(ad => ( ))}
ID Ad Name Impressions Clicks Conversion Rate
{ad.id} {ad.adName} {ad.impressions} {ad.clicks} {ad.conversionRate}
); }; export default Metrics;
